title: New: SKOTT – Porcelain
content:
There’s a Lana Del Rey meets Sia sort of vibe to Porcelain, the debut track from SKOTT, which features an absolutely stunning vocal and some gloriously over the top production.

Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
